53 EndEffectorInterfaceCore::EndEffectorInterfaceCore(ros::NodeHandle &nh, std::shared_ptr<ttl_driver::TtlInterfaceCore> ttl_interface) : _ttl_interface(std::move(ttl_interface))
54 {
55  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::ctor");
56 
57  init(nh);
58 }
59 
65 bool EndEffectorInterfaceCore::init(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
66 {
67  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::init - Initializing parameters...");
68  initParameters(nh);
69 
70  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initEndEffectorHardware...");
71  initEndEffectorHardware();
72 
73  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::init - Starting services...");
74  startServices(nh);
75 
76  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::init - Starting publishers...");
77  startPublishers(nh);
78 
79  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::init - Starting subscribers...");
80  startSubscribers(nh);
81 
82  return true;
83 }
84 
89 bool EndEffectorInterfaceCore::rebootHardware()
90 {
91  // reboot
92  bool res = _ttl_interface->rebootHardware(_end_effector_state);
93 
94  // re init
95  if (res)
96  initHardware();
97 
98  return res;
99 }
100 
105 void EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initParameters(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
106 {
107  int id = -1;
108  nh.getParam("end_effector_id", id);
109  _id = static_cast<uint8_t>(id);
110 
111  nh.getParam("/niryo_robot/simulation_mode", _simulation);
112 
113  double check_end_effector_status_frequency{1.0};
114  nh.getParam("check_end_effector_status_frequency", check_end_effector_status_frequency);
115  assert(check_end_effector_status_frequency);
116 
117  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initParameters - end effector id : %d", _id);
118  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initParameters - end effector status frequency : %f", check_end_effector_status_frequency);
119 
120  // init ros duration according to given frequency
121  _states_publisher_duration = ros::Duration(1.0 / check_end_effector_status_frequency);
122 
123  std::string hw_type;
124  int collision_thresh;
125  nh.getParam("hardware_type", hw_type);
126  nh.getParam("collision_thresh", collision_thresh);
127  auto ee_type = common::model::HardwareTypeEnum(hw_type.c_str());
128 
129  // initiliaze end effector state
130  _end_effector_state = std::make_shared<EndEffectorState>(_id, ee_type);
131 
132  _end_effector_state->setCollisionThresh(collision_thresh);
133 
134  if (nh.hasParam("collision_thresh_algo_2"))
135  {
136  int collision_thresh_algo2; // used
137  nh.getParam("collision_thresh_algo_2", collision_thresh_algo2);
138  _end_effector_state->setCollisionThreshAlgo2(collision_thresh_algo2);
139  }
140 
141  uint8_t button_id = 0;
142  while (nh.hasParam("button_" + std::to_string(button_id) + "/type"))
143  {
144  std::string button_type;
145  nh.getParam("button_" + std::to_string(button_id) + "/type", button_type);
146  auto eType = ButtonTypeEnum(button_type.c_str());
147 
148  ROS_INFO("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initParameters : configure button %d of type %s", button_id, eType.toString().c_str());
149  _end_effector_state->configureButton(button_id, eType);
150  button_id++;
151  }
152 }
153 
158 void EndEffectorInterfaceCore::startServices(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
159 {
160  _digital_out_server = nh.advertiseService("set_ee_io_state", &EndEffectorInterfaceCore::_callbackSetIOState, this);
161  _digital_in_server = nh.advertiseService("set_ee_di_state", &EndEffectorInterfaceCore::_callbackSetDIState, this);
162 }
163 
168 void EndEffectorInterfaceCore::startPublishers(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
169 {
170  _free_drive_button_state_publisher = nh.advertise<end_effector_interface::EEButtonStatus>("free_drive_button_status", 10, true);
171 
172  _save_pos_button_state_publisher = nh.advertise<end_effector_interface::EEButtonStatus>("save_pos_button_status", 10, true);
173 
174  _custom_button_state_publisher = nh.advertise<end_effector_interface::EEButtonStatus>("custom_button_status", 10, true);
175 
176  _digital_out_publisher = nh.advertise<end_effector_interface::EEIOState>("io_state", 10, true);
177 
178  _states_publisher_timer = nh.createTimer(_states_publisher_duration, &EndEffectorInterfaceCore::_publishButtonState, this);
179 }
180 
185 void EndEffectorInterfaceCore::startSubscribers(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
186 {
187  (void)nh; // unused
188 
189  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::startSubscribers - no subscribers to start");
190 }
191 
195 void EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initEndEffectorHardware()
196 {
197  // init driver
198  if (_end_effector_state && _end_effector_state->isValid())
199  {
200  int result = _ttl_interface->setEndEffector(_end_effector_state);
201 
202  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == result && niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == initHardware())
203  {
204  ROS_INFO("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::ctor - Set end effector success");
205  }
206  else
207  {
208  _end_effector_state->setConnectionStatus(false);
209  ROS_WARN("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initEndEffectorHardware - "
210  "Set end effector failure, return : %d. Aborted...",
211  result);
212  }
213  }
214 }
215 
219 int EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initHardware()
220 {
221  if (_end_effector_state)
222  {
223  uint32_t thresh = _end_effector_state->getCollisionThresh();
224 
225  if (_end_effector_state->getHardwareType() == EHardwareType::NED3PRO_END_EFFECTOR)
226  {
227  uint32_t thresh_algo_2 = _end_effector_state->getCollisionThreshAlgo2();
228 
229  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
230  std::make_unique<EndEffectorSingleCmd>(
231  EEndEffectorCommandType::CMD_TYPE_SET_COLLISION_THRESH_ALGO_2, _end_effector_state->getId(), std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{thresh_algo_2}));
232  }
233  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
234  std::make_unique<EndEffectorSingleCmd>(EEndEffectorCommandType::CMD_TYPE_SET_COLLISION_THRESH, _end_effector_state->getId(), std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{thresh}));
235  }
236  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
237 }
238 
243 void EndEffectorInterfaceCore::_publishButtonState(const ros::TimerEvent &)
244 {
245  EEButtonStatus button_msg;
246  EEIOState io_msg;
247 
248  if (_end_effector_state)
249  {
250  if (!_simulation)
251  {
252  for (const auto &button : _end_effector_state->getButtonsStatus())
253  {
254  if (button->actions.empty())
255  continue;
256 
257  button_msg.action = static_cast<uint8_t>(button->actions.front());
258  switch (button->type)
259  {
260  case EButtonType::FREE_DRIVE_BUTTON:
261  _free_drive_button_state_publisher.publish(button_msg);
262  break;
263  case EButtonType::SAVE_POSITION_BUTTON:
264  _save_pos_button_state_publisher.publish(button_msg);
265  break;
266  case EButtonType::CUSTOM_BUTTON:
267  _custom_button_state_publisher.publish(button_msg);
268  break;
269  default:
270  break;
271  }
272  button->actions.pop();
273  }
274  }
275 
276  // digital io state
277  io_msg.digital_input = _end_effector_state->getDigitalIn();
278  io_msg.digital_output = _end_effector_state->getDigitalOut();
279  _digital_out_publisher.publish(io_msg);
280  }
281 }
282 
289 bool EndEffectorInterfaceCore::_callbackSetIOState(end_effector_interface::SetEEDigitalOut::Request &req, end_effector_interface::SetEEDigitalOut::Response &res)
290 {
291  res.state = false;
292 
293  if (_end_effector_state && _end_effector_state->isValid())
294  {
295  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
296  std::make_unique<EndEffectorSingleCmd>(EEndEffectorCommandType::CMD_TYPE_DIGITAL_OUTPUT, _end_effector_state->getId(), std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{req.data}));
297  _end_effector_state->setDigitalOut(req.data);
298  // TODO(cc) find a way to check if ok
299  res.state = true;
300  }
301 
302  return res.state;
303 }
304 
311 bool EndEffectorInterfaceCore::_callbackSetDIState(niryo_robot_msgs::SetBool::Request &req, niryo_robot_msgs::SetBool::Response &res)
312 {
313  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::HARDWARE_NOT_SUPPORTED;
314  res.message = "Not implemented";
315 
316  if (_end_effector_state && _end_effector_state->isValid())
317  {
318  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
319  std::make_unique<EndEffectorSingleCmd>(EEndEffectorCommandType::CMD_TYPE_DIGITAL_INPUT, _end_effector_state->getId(), std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{req.value}));
320  _end_effector_state->setDigitalIn(req.value);
321  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
322  res.message = "Success";
323  }
324 
325  return res.status == niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
326 }
